member.name: T:Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Mvc.AuthorizationCodeMvcApp
member.summary: Thread-safe OAuth 2.0 authorization code flow for a MVC web application that persists end-user credentials.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Mvc.AuthorizationCodeMvcApp.AuthorizeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously authorizes the installed application to access user's protected data. It gets the user identifier by calling to and then calls to .
member.param: Cancellation token to cancel an operation
member.returns: Auth result object which contains the user's credential or redirect URI for the authorization server

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Mvc.Controllers.AuthCallbackController
member.summary: Auth callback to process the authorization code or error response from the authorization redirect page.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Mvc.Controllers.AuthCallbackController.OnTokenError(Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Responses.TokenErrorResponse)
member.summary: A callback which gets the error when this controller didn't receive an authorization code. The default implementation throws a .

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Mvc.Controllers.AuthCallbackController.IndexAsync(Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Responses.AuthorizationCodeResponseUrl,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
The authorization callback which receives an authorization code which contains an error or a code. If a code is available the method exchange the coed with an access token and redirect back to the original page which initialized the auth process (using the state parameter).
The current timeout is set to 10 seconds. You can change the default behavior by setting with a different value on your controller.
member.param: Authorization code response which contains the code or an error.
member.returns: Redirect action to the state parameter or in case of an error.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Mvc.Controllers.AuthCallbackController.UserId
member.summary: Gets the user identifier. Potential logic is to use session variables to retrieve that information.

member.summary: Flow metadata abstract class which contains the reference to the and method to get the user identifier.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.Mvc.FlowMetadata.AuthCallback
member.summary: Gets the authorization application's call back. That relative URL will handle the authorization code response.
